meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Noah Rachels Skylar Rampersaud Mike McCormick Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6494.

td.p: Noah Rachels, a university fundraiser from Astoria, New York
Skylar Rampersaud, a computer security researcher from Kapolei, Hawaii
Mike McCormick, a logistics director from Hockessin, Delaware (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,801)

tr.td: HOME SWEET MOTOR HOME
MOVIE MONEY
SHALL I COMPARE THEE?
THE NAME OF THE FLAG
AMERICAN WOMAN
STAY AWAY FROM MEAT

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Unlike fixed homes, most motor homes power their lights with this type of current that\'s found in batteries')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Unlike fixed homes, most motor homes power their lights with this type of current that's found in batteries

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
